name: Klee Data System
overview: Klee Data System SA provides travel and expense systems in Europe. It offers KDS Corporate, a travel and expense solution, which enables business travelers to book their journeys and manage their expense claims online, as well as allows employers to enforce corporate travel policies. The companyâ€™s KDS Corporate solution also provides support for low cost airlines, national rail, non GDS hotels, and non GDS car rental. In addition, it offers KDS Portal, which provides online solutions for traveler needs and travel management companies; and KDS Expense, an online travel tool for the corporate expense market. Further, the company provides back-end connectivity to airline, car, rail, and hotel providers. It offers its solutions for travel and expense management, which addresses travel policy definition and enforcement, online travel self-booking, and automated travel expense processing needs. The company serves corporate customers, travel management companies, and intermediaries. Klee Data System SA was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Le Plessis-Robinson, France with additional offices in San Francisco, London, Frankfurt, and Stockholm.
